tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: I mentioned earlier that—like when setting up a manual order at the exchange—you may define the size in either of the assets!

paragraphs.text: What I didn't mention is that you can't have two definitions! To avoid ambiguities, only one is allowed!
We will define the size in the base asset, so delete the Target Size In Quoted Asset node!
We will keep this one simple too. For the time being, we will use the whole balance available to the session.
How do we do that? You'll see!
